name: Retro Recycling Game
description:
Hey friends!

As requested by WWE Hall of Famer Madusa on her twitch stream, I have made a little funny game for her.

HOW TO PLAY:

-Use arrow keys (left and right)

-STAY AWAY from the title falling off thee sky as you will restart to 0 points

-Catch Eric up to 10 times, and you win!
